Pemvonis Miliarder Pemilik First Travel Jadi Ketua PN Denpasar
01 Nov 2019, 11:23 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Denpasar - Sobandi resmi dilantik menjadi Ketua Pengadilan Negeri (PN) Denpasar, Bali. Nama Sobandi familiar di publik saat menjadi ketua majelis kasus First Travel dengan terdakwa Andika Surachman dan Anniesa Hasibuan di PN Depok.
Pelantikan Sobandi digelar di Aula Pengadilan Tinggi (PT) Denpasar, Jl Tantular, Denpasar, Bali, Jumat (1/11/2019). Sobandi menggantikan Bambang Eka Putra, yang kini menjabat Wakil Ketua Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Utara.
"Ya kemarin akreditasi sempat turun dari A jadi B target kita tingkatkan lagi jadi A. Kemudian kebersihan, penanganan perkara, kedisiplinan pegawai di PN Denpasar, kebersihan dan manajemen risiko kita tingkatkan," kata Sobandi seusai pelantikan.
Dia menargetkan tahun depan indeks kepuasan pelayanan bisa semakin ditingkatkan. Dia ingin semua pelayanan maupun penanganan perkara bisa lebih cepat dan akurat.
"Kemarin pelayanan turun kita, dari sistem administrasi perkara maupun umum kita turun indeks kepuasannya. Kalau masalah administrasi kita ingin mendapat akreditasi A excellent, Sistem Manajemen Anti-Penyuapan (SMAP) itu administrasi, Senin sampai Rabu auditnya," jelasnya.
Dia juga berharap lingkungan PN Denpasar bisa semakin bersih sehingga membuat pengunjung nyaman. Mantan Ketua PN Depok itu berharap tak ada lagi penilaian lamban untuk pelayanan di kantornya.
"Dari fisik kita ingin meningkatkan kebersihan. Kita ingin memberikan pelayanan terbaik untuk Denpasar-Badung, kan kita wilayah pelayanannya itu. Jadi tidak ada istilah pelayanan lambat," tuturnya.
Di lokasi yang sama, Bambang berharap Sobandi bisa meningkatkan pelayanan bagi masyarakat. Bambang juga mengusulkan sistem aplikasi yang sudah disusunnya bisa digunakan untuk efisiensi pelayanan.
"Yang penting peningkatan pelayanannya, pengadilan berusaha memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik pada semua pencari keadilan. Ada beberapa aplikasi sistem online yang mulai berjalan mungkin bisa dimanfaatkan bagi para pencari keadilan mungkin maupun bagi aparat keadilan sendiri untuk memberikan pelayanan," pesan Bambang.
Bambang pun mengungkap butuh banyak perbaikan birokrasi di lingkungan PN Denpasar. Khususnya di bidang kedisiplinan dan etos kerja pegawai di bidang pelayanan maupun kantor.
"Sebenarnya kita sudah memberikan pelayanan terbaik cuma kadang-kadang kan waktu, masih ada yang agak lama misal terhambat di bawah. Kita butuh aparat yang di bawah, di meja PTSP dan di office, untuk memprosesnya lebih cepat sehingga ke ketuanya lebih cepat," ujar Bambang.
Sobandi sebelumnya diketahui menjadi ketua majelis hakim kasus First Travel di PN Depok, Jawa Barat. Dalam kasus itu, Sobandi memvonis Andika dan istrinya Anniesa masing-masing 20 tahun dan 18 tahun penjara.

Billionaire Verdict First Travel Owner Becomes Chairperson of the Denpasar District Court
Nov 01 2019, 11:23 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Denpasar - Sobandi was officially appointed as Chair of the Denpasar District Court (PN), Bali. Sobandi's name was familiar in the public when he was chairman of the First Travel case council with defendants Andika Surachman and Anniesa Hasibuan in Depok District Court.
Sobandi's inauguration was held in the Hall of the High Court (PT) Denpasar, Jl Tantular, Denpasar, Bali, Friday (11/01/2019). Sobandi replaces Bambang Eka Putra, who is now the Deputy Chairman of the North Jakarta District Court.
"Yes, yesterday the accreditation had dropped from A to B, we will increase the target again to A. Then cleanliness, case handling, employee discipline in Denpasar District Court, cleanliness and risk management will be increased," said Sobandi after the inauguration.
He targets next year the service satisfaction index can be further improved. He wants all services and case handling to be faster and more accurate.
"Yesterday, our service dropped, from the case administration system and from the general public, we dropped the satisfaction index. If the administrative problem is we want to get A excellent accreditation, the Anti-Bribery Management System (SMAP) is administration, Monday to Wednesday the audit," he explained.
He also hopes that the Denpasar PN environment can be cleaner so that it makes visitors comfortable. The former Chief of Depok District Court hopes that there will be no more slow assessments for services in his office.
"From the physical we want to improve cleanliness. We want to provide the best service for Denpasar-Badung, right we are the service area. So there is no slow service term," he said.
In the same location, Bambang hopes that Sobandi can improve services for the community. Bambang also suggested the application system that he had compiled could be used for service efficiency.
"The important thing is to improve services, the court is trying to provide the best service to all justice seekers. There are a number of online system applications that are starting to run, perhaps they can be used by justice seekers as well as for the justice apparatus themselves to provide services," Bambang said.
Bambang also revealed that there was a need to improve the bureaucracy in the Denpasar District Court. Especially in the field of discipline and employee work ethics in the service and office fields.
"Actually, we already provide the best service only sometimes, right? There are still some time, for example, it is hampered below. We need the officials below, on the PTSP desk and in the office, to process it faster so that the chairman is faster," he said. Bambang.
Sobandi was previously known to be chairman of the panel of judges in the First Travel case in the Depok District Court, West Java. In that case, Sobandi sentenced Andika and his wife Anniesa to 20 years and 18 years in prison respectively.
